format.name: WordCountChecker
format.description: The argument value must have at most 8 words. Longer responses are not allowed.

fn_schema.name: extract_actionable_items
fn_schema.description: Extracts actionable items and tasks from the given meeting notes.

notes_text.description: The full text of meeting notes from which to extract action items. The argument value must have at most 8 words; longer responses are not allowed.

priority_level.description: The priority level to assign to the extracted action items.

deadline_in_days.description: The number of days from now when the tasks should be completed.

user_queries: Could you help me go through the meeting notes from today's project sync and list out all the actionable items and tasks that were discussed? Here are the notes: 'Agenda: Review Q2 milestones. Discussion: Sarah to prepare the marketing presentation by next week. John will follow up with suppliers regarding outstanding invoices within 5 days. Emily is to draft the client email by Thursday. Decisions: Move product launch to July. Assignments: Ralph to coordinate with the design team for new banners.' Please focus only on high-priority tasks and set a deadline for all tasks to be completed within 3 days from now.

I've just finished updating the minutes from our strategy meeting, and I need some help extracting the key tasks everyone needs to handle. The notes are as follows: 'Kickoff at 10 AM. Budget review delayed to next month. Maria promised to submit the revised budget proposal this week. Technical: Lucas to oversee server migration. Anna will schedule a client call. IT to set up VPN for remote staff.' I want you to identify the action items, consider them as medium priority, and make sure the tasks are to be completed within the next 7 days.

I'm overwhelmed after today's management meeting, and I need a summary of all actionable steps we agreed on. Here's the full meeting note: 'Opening: Review on Q1 sales - negative growth. Task allocation: Victor to prepare follow-up report by Friday. HR: Nia to update the hiring policy. Operations: Michael to coordinate office maintenance next week. All: Review action points at next huddle.' Please extract all the action points, treat them as low priority, and set a deadline of 14 days for completion.

I'd appreciate if you could analyze our department meeting notes and list every relevant task and responsibility that was mentioned. Here's the entire transcript: 'Introductions. Marketing: Rachel to revamp campaign materials by March 5. Laurent is responsible for vendor negotiations. IT: Pablo tasked with reviewing cybersecurity protocols. All to submit project updates by Friday.' Extract the actionable items, assign a high priority, and require that everything is done within 5 days.

Please read through these notes from our product team session and identify all follow-up items and tasks assigned: 'Product update: Beta release planned. Engineering: Olivia to address user feedback issues. QA: Mark to create new test scenarios. Design: Fiona to update mobile UI mockups by next Monday. Marketing to prepare launch assets.' I want to treat all extracted items as medium priority, and make sure the tasks should be finalized in 10 days.
